entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
